description:
This is the eighth lesson in the World Religions series. In this lesson we will discuss the specific beliefs of the Mormon faith. This course is structured in a way to give you a complete overview of this belief system. We will lay out for you which beliefs have changed and which ones have stayed the same. We will be discussing:

  • Basic Mormon Beliefs
  • Beliefs about heaven
  • Stance on controversial issues
  • Differences with other religions

We hope you will join us for this exciting and informative class. We hope you will enjoy it and that you will gain the knowledge you need to understand this world religion.
title: 208  -  Mormon Beliefs
